mapper.select: SELECT fosc.id as id, fosc.buyer_user_id as buyerUserId, fosc.order_type as orderType, fosc.is_must_img as isMustImg, fosc.start_time as startTime, fosc.end_time as endTime, fosc.create_time as createTime, fosc.update_time as updateTime, fosc.ext1 as ext1, fosc.ext2 as ext2, fosc.ext3 as ext3 FROM fm_order_simple_config fosc WHERE 1=1 AND fosc.buyer_user_id = #{buyerUserId} AND fosc.order_type = #{orderType} AND DATE_FORMAT(fosc.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d')<=DATE_FORMAT(#{nowTime},'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{nowTime},'%Y-%m-%d')<=DATE_FORMAT(fosc.end_time,'%Y-%m-%d')
